pull_request.body:
### Task
- [Implement Smart Inbox Settings](https://digitalcrew.teamwork.com/#tasks/21419431)
  - Implement `<ConditionsBuilder/>`
  - Implement `<ConditonRow/>`

### Screencap
#### `<ConditionsBuilder/>`
![conditionsbuilder](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/621330/52656284-abc69580-2efe-11e9-89af-9b0dab68c494.gif)

#### `<ConditonRow/>`
- UI Explanation
![conditionrow](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/621330/52656775-bb92a980-2eff-11e9-8492-4b550b584a1e.png)
- Blank State
![blankconditionrow](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/621330/52656835-e2e97680-2eff-11e9-994e-1ff426a6b7e9.png)
- Empty State for not provided values
  - Tags
  ![notags](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/621330/52656880-fa286400-2eff-11e9-8206-fee059f08356.png)
  - Companies
  ![nocompanies](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/621330/52656897-04e2f900-2f00-11e9-82b4-88e7f58b05d7.png)
- Validation Errors
  - Tags
  ![notselectedtagerror](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/621330/52656942-2643e500-2f00-11e9-9d06-7ec813e35c2b.png)
  - Companies
  ![notselectedcompanyerror](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/621330/52656955-2e038980-2f00-11e9-8ede-5738fb0fdd74.png)
- Row Error (loading data error)
![conditionrowunexpectederror](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/621330/52656976-3b207880-2f00-11e9-9a9f-f01c3c417715.png)
- All Possible Condition Rows
![allpossibleconditions](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/621330/52657021-5be8ce00-2f00-11e9-91e1-910730e4bef6.png)
